documents.document: RT @AmbitiousQuotz: Aspire to do more with your life. Don't let negative people influence you. Fight for your hopes and dreams.
The greatest thing you'll ever learn is just to love and be loved in return -Moulin Rouge! (2001)
RT @LiveBetterFeelB: How I became an extremely happy person by getting rid of the negativity in my life: http://t.co/J5yxZZrjp5
We live, we die, and the wheels on the bus go round and round. -The Bucket List (2007)
RT @LoveLifeQuote__: Always smile at life. Never give up. Life is good.
Well, love was never meant to be easy. Whether in finding it or keeping it. -Reality of Life (2002)
RT @LiveBetterFeelB: How I became a very happy person by abolishing negativity from my life: http://t.co/J5yxZZrjp5
Your life isn't over because he's gone. It's just beginning cause you're free. -Lying to be Perfect (2010)
RT @Quotes4ftheSoul: Be audacious. You deserve everything that you're willing to work for. Always keep fighting for what you believe in.
You know what music is? God's little reminder that there's something else besides us in this universe. -August Rush (2007)
RT @LiveBetterFeelB: How I became happy by getting rid of the negativity in my life: http://t.co/J5yxZZrjp5
The people that really care about you don't mind if you make mistakes. -Starter for 10 (2006)
RT @LoveLifeQuote__: Work hard for your dreams. Ignore all the negative people around you. Every day is a new adventure.
Some say life is hard, but that is just talk. It is good to be alive, it is exciting! -Dreams (1990)
You know, they say we learn more from losing than from winning. - A Boy Named Charlie Brown (1969)
RT @LiveBetterFeelB: How I replaced my bad habits with positive ones: http://t.co/J5yxZZrjp5
Things will happen in your life that you can't stop. But that's no reason to shut out the world. -Now and Then (1995)
RT @Quotes4ftheSoul: Stay focused on your goals. Embrace things that make you feel positive. Do what makes you happy.
As we grow older, it becomes difficult to believe. It's not we dont want to, but too much happened and we can't. -Now and Then (1995)

RT @Motivated_Self: Work hard for what you love. Accomplish your goals. Stay true to yourself.
Real loss is only possible when you love something more than you love yourself -Good Will Hunting (1997)

RT @PositivesQuote: Live healthy and think healthy. Be creative. Love your life with all your soul.
